duties_responsibilities.duty: Design, implement, and maintain the organization's network infrastructure, including hardware, software, and connectivity.
Monitor network performance, troubleshoot issues, and ensure high availability and reliability.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate, test, and deploy network systems and services.
Provide technical support and guidance to end-users, addressing network-related concerns and ensuring security and compliance.
Conduct regular assessments and audits of network systems to identify vulnerabilities and optimize performance.
Stay up-to-date with industry trends and best practices, and recommend enhancements to the network environment.
